content: From the first Keeper's Shrine of the Chapter, go right. On the other side of the underpass, you'll walk straight into another round of fighting. This time, you'll find the Revenants fighting Bull Sergeants.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Pale-Axe_Stalwart.md', within the main section titled 'Pale-Axe Stalwart', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find Pale-Axe Stalwart'.
The content is as follows:
From the first Keeper's Shrine of the Chapter, go right. On the other side of the underpass, you'll walk straight into another round of fighting. This time, you'll find the Revenants fighting Bull Sergeants.
